Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/filesystems/ext2

What you'll find here: the most featureful of the Linux filesystems

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

technical overview of the ext2 filesystem (44235 bytes)

source for various ext2 programs (527459 bytes)

tools for accessing ext2 partition from dos (287706 bytes)
